title: Does the Fall Out boy have a name? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as I know, he’s just known as the Vault Boy.  Ah yes, the Vault Boy. The mascot of the in-game company Vault-Tec. The graphical representation of your stats in the first Fallout, becoming so popular that he eventually became the mascot of the series itself.

Vault Boy seems to be the ‘canon’ name, as a letter that mentions the Vault-Tec bobbleheads calls them ‘Vault Boy’ too. "Be sure to present this letter to your Vault-Tec representative to receive your special, commemorative Vault Boy bobble-head toy!" (text from the Fallout Wikia article: Vault-Tec bobblehead)

In every incarnation of the fallout series, the vault-tec corporation never named its mascot, but most people in the community have decided to name the character Vault-Boy, since he is used so heavily in the advertising for the vaults.
